Description:
Enchanting Home / Outstanding Location
Quietly tucked away in the heart of East Geelong, exuding character and charm throughout. This quaint home allows you to move in with absolute ease, yet would respond exceptionally well to a modern transformation. You will enjoy the most privileged lifestyle being only moments from all of the action of the Garden Street Shopping Precinct, South Geelong Train Station and the Geelong CBD.
Enter into the comfortable open plan living and dining area capturing fantastic natural light. Accompanying is the central kitchen, well equipped with ample cupboard space and stainless steel appliances.
Entertaining will be made easy with the expansive undercover decking, allowing for all year-round use with complete privacy. This overlooks the neat and tidy landscaped backyard for kids and pets.
Completing the home is three spacious bedrooms, two with BIR's and one with direct access out onto the deck. The main bathroom has received a modern update and is well positioned to service the home.
Features:
- Ducted Heating
- Secure off-street parking space.
- Split System A/C
- Ceiling Fans
Take advantage of a very exciting opportunity to enter the East Geelong market.
Terms: 10% Deposit, 60 day Settlement. For alternative arrangements, please discuss with agent.
Insights: 2 Mann Street, East Geelong VIC 3219 was last sold in 2018 and 31 other 3 bedroom house in East Geelong have recently been sold.

Description:
Near New Executive Home on Own Title
This immaculate and near new executive home is perfect for those looking for a lifestyle decision around low maintenance living standards and it's found in an idyllic peaceful location close to the Bellarine shopping centre and all local amenities and conveniences. Ideally suited for the busy couple, or for those wanting to potentially downsize but can easily accommodate the younger growing family. Offering 3 spacious bedrooms master with WIRs and full ensuite. You will feel right at home in the spacious modern kitchen complete with stainless appliances, and ample storage overlooking the main family room. Outdoors provides plenty of entertaining and yard space drenched in natural north facing sunshine. Single remote garage provides internal access whilst a second full bathroom services bedrooms 2 and 3 and a separate laundry. Positioned on a smart block and separately titled with low maintenance gardens. Nothing to spend except move in and enjoy!

Description:
Opportunity Awaits In Central Location
This lovely three bedroom, one bath home set on a spacious corner block located in a quiet street of Newcomb, making this a perfect investment into the one of the most popular suburbs of Geelong. Located within walking distance to the local shopping center including Woolworths, Aldi, library, health care and only a short drive into to Geelong CBD. Situated just moment's walk to all amenities, with the opportunity to put your own finishing touches on this low maintenance home. This property will make a very smart investment for
buyers looking to just set and forget as it has tenants in the property, but is also a great opportunity for a first home buyer or a new family with two high schools and a primary school only a couple of hundred meters away.
Don't want to miss this hidden gem tucked away in Newcomb, get in fast as properties in this price range are becoming very rare in Geelong. Currently leased at $280 p/w until 1st February 2019.

Description:
A Hidden Oasis
If you are looking to downsize on space but not wanting to compromise on quality, privacy and security, you will appreciate this meticulously cared for three bedroom, two bathroom townhouse on it's own title. Tucked away in one of Newcomb's best streets and only a 5 min walk to the Bellarine and Centro shopping centres, it is also close to schools, parks, medical facilities and public transport. The large main bedroom has ensuite and walk in robe and the other two bedrooms both have built in robes. There is a spacious central bathroom with bath and separate shower. The light filled open plan living area opens to the private north facing delightful courtyard which includes a timber deck, established gardens, fruit trees and veggies. A real plus is the double garage with remote roller door and single door access into the courtyard. Suiting first home buyers, investors or downsizers, this one is too good to miss. Extra features include: Own title and driveway. Sensor lights. Electric shutter on master bedroom. Solar panels. Solar assisted gas hot water. Reserve cycle air conditioning in the living area. Approx 9 years old.

Address: 27 Chandos Court St Albans Park VIC 3219
Description:
Stunning and Updated Home in Quiet Location.
Here is your chance to get into the market with a home that has already had everything done and finished off beautifully. The owner has transformed this home with great taste and ready for a family to take advantage of the great layout and entertaining spaces. With high, private white picketed fence out the front and loads of yard all around the house there is plenty of space to store your cars, boat, trailer and caravan.... Or loads of space for the little kids to run around. The dazzling kitchen is well positioned in the middle of the home and overlooking the entertaining area outside and inside. Recently renovated with bright white tones the kitchen offers 2-pack finish, self-closing drawers, in-built wine rack, dishwasher, 600mm stainless steel range hood, cook top & oven. All three bedrooms have built-in robes, wall-to-wall carpets, the main living area is open but can be closed off with double doors that can separate the dining and kitchen area. With big sliding door flowing the inside living straight to the enclosed pergola perfect for summer and winter with complete privacy. There is also space for a home business or party room with half of the double garage decked out for use as a room. Other features include double carport, gas wall furnace, split system all on a very generous 644m2 (approx.). Call now before you miss this amazing home.

Description:
FULLY RENOVATED IN PRIME LOCATION
Set on a generous 640m2 (approx) allotment this property is ready to move into and enjoy. Upon entering the home, you will notice the quality finishes including newly renovated kitchen, bathroom and freshly painted throughout.
Comprising of three generous sized bedrooms all with built-in robes and ceiling fans. The central family bathroom has been updated to a modern level and includes free standing bath and separate shower. Plus a handy powder room.
Through to the kitchen/dining you will find stunning stone bench tops, gas cooking, S/S appliances, dishwasher, island bench and an abundance of storage. Flowing from the kitchen/dining is the light filled family room with built in fire place.
Leading from the dining area through bi-fold doors step out onto the undercover pergola area that wraps around the rear of the home perfect for entertaining. Beyond the pergola you will find the north backyard big enough for any family with ample shedding.
Other features of this home include Split System heating /cooling, close to schools, shops, walking distance to CBD and waterfront.
Rent $370 p/w apx
640m2 approx block
Floorboards throughout
Stone Benchtops and Gas cooking
Development potential (STCA)
Nothing to do but move in and enjoy

Description:
Subdivide or Renovate? Do The Work And Reap The Rewards!
Corner block, approximately 673 square metres of prime land in the heart of Newcomb, substantial shedding and with smoke and fire damage in 3 rooms this one is definitely not for the faint of heart. Viewing this property is a must as there is so much potential on offer to the right buyer with the home currently comprising of 3 bedrooms, separate living and dining room and a timber kitchen plus a bathroom that has been partially renovated.
Facing Wilsons Rd. but with side access also from Adzar Rd. this flat parcel of land is ripe for subdivision (S.T.C.A.) and with Newcomb shopping Ccentre, schools, local shops and medical facilities located close by the demand for townhouses in the area has never been greater making this a very attractive proposition.
Unaffected by the fire, the massive 6 car garage with storage space and workshop is ideal for tradesmen or those that love to tinker in the garage and is a great place to start with the rebuilding of the home if that's the plan.
This very rare opportunity is certainly not for everyone but those that can see the value and are up for the challenge should certainly jump at the chance to buy in ever popular Newcomb. Make the time to view the property and prepare to roll your sleeves up and reap the rewards!
Insights: 48 Wilsons Road, Newcomb VIC 3219 was last sold in 2018 and 61 other 3 bedroom house in Newcomb have recently been sold.

Description:
Affordable buying in sought after suburb
Situated in a quiet court location, minutes to local shops, schools and public transport, on the edge of East Geelong and Geelong CBD, and only 10 minutes to coastal areas.
This BV home is offered in neat condition however provides the opportunity for someone to renovate/extend or develop the site. The home provides a formal lounge with laminate flooring, gas heater and reverse cycle airconditioner, kitchen/meals, 3 good sized bedrooms - 2 with built in robes, one with freestanding robe which will remain, bathroom with separate bath and shower and separate toilet. Outdoors is a large rear yard with established fruit trees and a carport for a single car. Allotment approx 739sqm. Roll up your sleeves and put some time and money into renovations and you can drastically increase the value here, or start from scratch and build a new home or townhouses STCA. There are several options offered, make sure you put this on your list and secure a property in this popular location!

Description:
Spacious, Single Level Living
Solid, sound and secure is this brick home in a quiet street location. Consisting of 3 bedrooms, master with ensuite and walk in robe, family bathroom, 2 spacious living areas, single garage and second car space. There is a private rear garden, all well sited on this block of approximately 363m2 in an enviable location, walking distance to the Eastern Gardens, waterfront and city centre.

Description:
Don't miss this Opportunity in a Residential Growth Zone
You will find a large 655.10m2 (approx.) in the booming market of Newcomb the perfect opportunity as this block is set in the Residential growth zone, it is a fantastic block for a developer/ investor to have the opportunity to subdivide, but also in a great location.
With a short walk to shops including Aldi, Woolworths, health care, library and great public transport but also it's only a six minute drive to Geelong CBD where you will find everything you need such as shopping, entertainment and also beautiful restaurants that overlook the water. If your looking to move closer to the beach you will find that it's a short drive down to Eastern Beach where you will find its great for all ages.
You don't want to miss this block of land, an awesome opportunity for the right buyer make sure that you come have a look at it because it will go.

Address: 8 Garnfield Place St Albans Park VIC 3219
Description:
Everything a family needs...
Situated in a quiet position, minutes to local shops, public transport and schools, 10 minutes to Geelong CBD and the Bellarine. Perfect for families, offering space, privacy and convenience! Built in 2001, this quality built home comprises a formal lounge and dining areas, open plan kitchen/meals/family plus a rumpus room. The timber kitchen has been updated with an electric cooktop, fanforced oven and s/s dishwasher. There are 4 bedrooms, 3 with built in robes, the master is zoned at the front of the property with walk in robe and ensuite. The family bathroom provides a separate bath and shower, and separate toilet.
Outdoors is an amazing undercover area, leading from the dining area. With cafe blinds, this area can be utilised all year round for combined indoor/outdoor entertaining. There is a very neat rear yard with stunning gardens and a large tool/storage shed. The double garage is remote controlled and has a rear roller door through to the pergola, as well as internal access. There are also side gates to allow easy access to the backyard and storage of a boat/trailer/caravan. Allotment approximately 644sqm.
Insights: 8 Garnfield Place, St Albans Park VIC 3219 was last sold in 2018 and 11 other 4 bedroom house in St Albans Park have recently been sold.

Description:
The Jewel of the East
Prepare to be delighted by this adorable, single fronted Californian Bungalow. Nestled in one of East Geelong's most revered, tree lined streets, this home will capture you with its perfect blend of charm and all of the modern luxuries you could ask for.
This home has been beautifully restored and extended, displaying polished floorboards, high ceilings and period features throughout. Featuring two large bedrooms with Built in robes, Master with walk in robe and brand new ensuite, open plan living and dining, modern kitchen with stainless steel Bosch appliances, induction cooktop and pyrolitic oven, timber benchtops and splash-backs, stylish central bathroom, study with built in benchtops, loft-style library nook, spacious laundry and hallway link from the original house to the secluded Master wing. Outside displays established gardens, a sunlit courtyard with deck entertaining area, single lock up garage/carport, garden shed and many other qualities.
Other features include; ducted heating, split system heating and cooling, dual hot water temperature controls, water tank, ducted vacuum, security doors and rear lane access. Located a short walk to the Boutique shopping and café precinct of East Geelong, South Geelong train station, the CBD and the waterfront, this is truly one of this year's most exciting homes to hit the market.
Insights: 27 Loch Street, East Geelong VIC 3219 was last sold in 2018 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in East Geelong have recently been sold.

Address: 6-8 Freeman Court St Albans Park VIC 3219
Description:
A Recipe For Relaxation!
Nestled in a peaceful court upon approx. 2513m2, this property allows you to enjoy the perks of country-style living while being moments away from life's conveniences!
A bus stop is only a leisurely stroll from your front door, while a short drive will find you at the shopping centres on the Bellarine Highway. Growing families are taken care of with St. Albans Kindergarten nearby and a selection of schools within easy reach.
It's easy to see that this home has been cherished over the years, with the original interiors in spotless condition. The L-shaped lounge and dining room overlooks the surrounding gardens, while the kitchen/meals zone flows onto the generous sunroom with backyard views. The kitchen is well equipped with a large BIP, dishwasher and s/steel cooking appliances (wall oven, 900mm gas hob, rangehood).
Entertaining is a breeze with the fully enclosed sunroom, complete with a split-system air conditioner, opening onto the spacious sheltered alfresco deck. Whether you're hosting a casual barbeque or a fun-filled family event, this space will effortlessly accommodate!
The Master Bedroom boasts built-in robes and an en suite with large shower, dual vanity, toilet, and storage. Three additional BRs feature built-in robes, while the main bathroom is complete with a spa bath and shower. The laundry boasts ample storage.
Ducted heating, three additional split-system air conditioners, and a gas wall heater keep you comfortable all year long, while an alarm system offers peace of mind.
The secure backyard is a wonderland for children and adults alike. The established trees and gardens will delight green thumbs, while a selection of fruit trees means you can enjoy mandarins, apricots, and guava straight from the branch! 11 Solar panels and 2 rainwater tanks, providing 6000 gallons of water storage combined, promote eco-friendly living.
With undercover parking available for eight vehicles, this home will instantly appeal to tradies and those looking to store caravans, boats, or trailers. The remote double lock-up garage features rear roller door access to the backyard, while the side gate allows larger vehicles access to the tall carport. The powered work shed is complete with built-in benches and also offers plenty of room for vehicle storage.
With something to impress every family member, you'll need to act quickly to secure this fantastic property! Inspect without delay!
Insights: 6-8 Freeman Court, St Albans Park VIC 3219 was last sold in 2018 and 11 other 4 bedroom house in St Albans Park have recently been sold.

Description:
Update, Create And Make It Your Own
Centrally located in the heart of Thomson, quietly nestled between renowned schools, sporting reserves, cafes and shopping while offering easy access to the Geelong Ring Road and both the Bellarine Peninsula and Surf Coast is this exceptional opportunity.
Positioned perfectly, the home represents endless potential for families, investors, developers (STCA) or first homebuyers in this truly exclusive location. Spacious and charming, the home offers two spacious bedrooms, a light filled living room, functional kitchen that includes ample bench and cupboard space with the adjacent dining/meals area that flows through to the family lounge room. The family bathroom is centrally located, while the laundry is at the rear.
Well-thought out in design, this flowing floor plan provides great space and comfort for any family big or small, a split system offering comfort all year round with heating and cooling, as well as plenty of natural flowing light throughout.
The outside of the home will be the talking point amongst buyers, a sun drenched front and back yard that offer endless potential, as well as single car lock up garage/workshop.
An inviting facade ready for its new owners! Enjoy as is, extend and renovate or clear the block and recreate (STCA).
Situated on 591m2 approx allotment offering rare affordability, this outstanding opportunity is one not to be missed.

Description:
CALLING ALL INVESTORS OR FIRST HOME BUYERS
Situated in a quiet court this 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom, open living kitchen/dining/lounge property on 403m2 approx block has so much potential.
This property could be the ideal addition to your rental portfolio. Also perfect for those wanting to get into the market, with a little TLC this could be your perfect first home.
3 good sized bedrooms all with BIRs, central bathroom, kitchen with WIP, plus low maintenance garden and paved court yard. With easy access to the CBD, schools, shops and transport.
Currently rented at $300pw, this property will not last long!
- 3 Bedroom Family Home
- Split System A/C
- Gas Heating
- Great Location
- Currently Rented $300pw
- Close to Schools, Shops & Transport

Address: 4 Nivek Court St Albans Park VIC 3219
Description:
Spacious family living in a quiet court location
Sprawling over approximately 746sqm, this solidly built brick veneer home presents an amazing opportunity for those who can seek to find large family living with a prospect to stamp their own flare to a property.
Accommodation consists of four spacious bedrooms (all with built in robes) master with ensuite, central second bathroom, two living zones, open kitchen with gas appliances and pantry, laundry, split system, ducted heating and a secure double garage.
Outside you're spoiled with a blank canvas to create your own alfresco area and also take full advantage of the side access, perfect for a boat or a caravan.
With St Albans Park having a family orientated atmosphere, its close proximity to the city centre, local schools, public transport and parks this property will tick all the boxes for all comers.
Insights: 4 Nivek Court, St Albans Park VIC 3219 was last sold in 2018 and 11 other 4 bedroom house in St Albans Park have recently been sold.

Description:
Neat as a Pin!
This gorgeous townhouse is located in a quiet pocket, just East of Geelong, close to the Waterfront and the Geelong CBD. The home has been kept in pristine condition, with the carpets and blinds recently refurbished and most appliances have been updated within the last couple of years.
The home displays a light filled open plan area, with modern kitchen, lounge and dining areas, two bedrooms with built in robes, central bathroom, spacious laundry and single car garage. The open plan living opens to a secure, lush rear yard with undercover entertaining, clothes drying area and water tank access.
Features: Gas heating, electric oven/gas cooktop, split system heating/cooling, ceiling fans, water tank, awnings, modern blinds, ample storage, low maintenance established gardens and picturesque street appeal.
Insights: 5/21-23 Helmer Crescent, East Geelong VIC 3219 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
Delightful downsizer in great location
Showcasing immaculate low-maintenance style, this generously-proportioned residence offers charming light-filled living in a secluded part of town.
Perfectly positioned in a quiet street, it's hard to believe this whisper-quiet, two-bedroom home is situated in the heart of Newcomb just moments from a vibrant shopping complex, close to public transport, schools and in easy reach of the Bellarine Peninsula.
Offering an ultra-convenient lifestyle on 365 sqm, this move-in ready property will appeal to those looking to downsize, first-home buyers and investors alike as the popular suburb continues to thrive.
Set on a corner allotment, the home's focus is an open plan entertaining zone where the quality kitchen with induction cooktop and plenty of bench-space overlooks a large sundrenched lounge and dining area, ideal for entertaining guests.
The tranquil front master bedroom features a walk-in robe and large floor-to-ceiling windows while the second bedroom with built-in robes is also spacious, bright and meticulously maintained.
Both bedrooms share a separate powder room and sparkling central bathroom complemented by sleek tiles and quality fittings and fixtures that are sure to impress.
Wanting for nothing, this neat home also features central heating and refrigerated cooling, large laundry, established gardens and oversized lock-up garage/home office with loads of storage.
Insights: 2 Murray Street, Newcomb VIC 3219 was last sold in 2018 and 5 other 2 bedroom house in Newcomb have recently been sold.
